title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 208/93 of 1 February 1993 in the country nomenclature for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 208/93 of 1 February 1993 in the country nomenclature for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The version valid on 1 January 1993 of the country nomenclature for the external trade statistics of the Community and statistics of trade between Member States is set out in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 February 1993.
For the Commission
Henning CHRISTOPHERSEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 183, 14. 7. 1975, p. 3.
(2) OJ No L 147, 14. 6. 1988, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 334, 5. 12. 1991, p. 10.
(4) OJ No L 146, 28. 5. 1992, p. 48.
